summary: Matt Furie - In the world of memes, the collection created by Matt Furie has inspired many different memes, making it a vast and grand collection. Unlike ordinary collections, MEMA is an endless source of inspiration for memes. In the world of meme coins, those inspired by Matt Furie's characters are very successful, and even more, they create overnight millionaires. A slight pump is enough to send everything to the moon. When meme coins are in chaos, once again we must look towards Matt Furie. This time, let MEME make us strong once more. MEME is the embodiment of the strong, the gathering of the strongest among the strong, bringing the light of diamonds to the diamond hands, and making the jeets a thing of the past.
